translations: n.彩色粉笔（或炭笔、蜡笔）；彩色粉笔（或炭笔、蜡笔）画

蜡笔小新, 新番连载, 蜡笔小新新番连载, 蜡笔小新杰作选

sentences.sentence: Someone had scribbled all over the table in crayon.
sentences.translation: 不知谁用蜡笔胡写乱画，桌面上都涂满了。

sentences.sentence: He colored the picture with crayon.
He coloured the picture with crayon.
